column1: San Sebastián de los Reyes (colloquially called "Sanse") is a municipality in the Community of Madrid
column3: it is located 20 km north of Madrid.

column1: It forms an urban continuum with the neighboring Alcobendas

Alcobendas and San Sebastián de los Reyes share a common Renfe commuter line to Madrid Atocha. Access by road is also excellent as it lies at the northernmost junctions of the motorway network to Zaragoza
Major industrial companies have branches in San Sebastián de los Reyes

column2: located in the north of the municipality
column3: hosted the Spanish Grand Prix and Spanish motorcycle Grand Prix between the 1960s and 1980s.
